item.title: Two posts on off-grid electricity
item.description: I wrote two posts for Power for All. They draw on new data from IRENA on off-grid renewable electricity capacity in emerging and developing countries. In short, these data show (a) that capacity has increased substantially over the last 10 years, (b) not all developing countries benefitted from it, and (c) the most successful countries seem to be mid-income ones. See here: Middle-Income Countries Big Winner from Off-Grid Energy. Who’s Next?
